Package com.daml.ledger.rxjava.components

Class LedgerViewFlowable.LedgerView<R>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.daml.ledger.rxjava.components.LedgerViewFlowable.LedgerView<R>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - The type of the contracts in this application.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LedgerViewFlowable.LedgerTestView
    Enclosing class:
    LedgerViewFlowable
    public static class LedgerViewFlowable.LedgerView<R>
extends java.lang.Object
    The local view of the Ledger. This view is created and updated every time a new event is received by the client.
